reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: Global Counterterrorism Toolkit and Web App

description.narrative: This award strives to help nations effectively establish the conditions and capacity for achieving peace, security, and stability. More specifically, this includes Covers contractual services covering personal services, supplies, and material when such services are not otherwise classified. Includes contract secretaries and other contract personnel required for ITA events and projects. Includes IBC contract personnel with equipment and supplies, and FAS contracts and agreements for technical assistance, secretaries, and foreign nationals; research, projects, and public relations contracts for sponsored events.. Olga Kalashnikova (202) 663-1481[Covers contractual services covering personal services, supplies, and material when such services are not otherwise classified. Includes contract secretaries and other contract personnel required for ITA events and projects. Includes IBC contract personnel with equipment and supplies, and FAS contracts and agreements for technical assistance, secretaries, and foreign nationals; research, projects, and public relations contracts for sponsored events.]. Information Redacted [Covers miscellaneous contractual services not otherwise classified.]. Covers miscellaneous contractual services not otherwise classified under Miscellaneous/Other Contractual Services.. Information has been redacted in accordance with the two principled exceptions defined in the Foreign Aid Transparency and Accountability Act (FATAA) of 2016: the health and security of implementing partners, and the national interest of the United States.. Information Redacted [Covers contractual services covering personal services, supplies, and material when such services are not otherwise classified. Includes contract secretaries and other contract personnel required for ITA events and projects. Includes IBC contract personnel with equipment and supplies, and FAS contracts and agreements for technical assistance, secretaries, and foreign nationals; research, projects, and public relations contracts for sponsored events.].

To help nations effectively establish the conditions and capacity for achieving peace, security, and stability; and for responding effectively against arising threats to national or international security and stability.
